name: Serviio
0:
”Alexa, Ask Serviio what is currently playing on bedroom TV”
”Alexa, Ask Serviio to play Avatar on Xbox One”
”Alexa, Ask Serviio to listen to rock music on this Echo”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: serviio
des: This skill enables you to control your Serviio Pro server. You need the Pro edition and your Serviio server has to be accessible from the Internet. You can either play media on the Echo devices or on any DLNA devices on your network. For detailed description visit http://serviio.org/alexa
